quoteText:
Regardless of DNT preference, our logs that contain IP addresses
and user agent strings are deleted after 10 days unless a DNT exception applies.
title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states "logs that contain IP addresses and user agent strings are deleted after 10 days unless a DNT exception applies."
